titleStmt.title: The statesman's last will and testament; or, His worthy legacies left to his beloved cronies, for whom he had a particular kindness. Tune of, O rare Popery.

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Alas! I am taken most monstrous ill ..."
Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University, Houghton Library.
